Name: Hotel Sowls
About the game: Hotel Sowls is a mysterious adventure game with unique and appealing 2D graphics. As an pharmacologist, you managed to get a valuable and mysterious stone after a hard journey and you decided to take a break at the Hotel Sowls. But the next morning, someone in the hotel stole the stone! Can you find a stone in this strange and mysterious hotel and find out the secret of the hotel? features Surreal, strange setting and items Intriguing story unraveling through collecting journals Multiple endings Unlockable hidden rooms Various original soundtracks Windows and Mac support Also we have our beautiful soundtrack DLC and soundtrack bundle! Check them if you're interested. website :: Twitter ::
